r.s: A effective,fast,stable log extension for PHP.
r.d: A effective,fast,stable log extension for PHP. - In the PHP project, for convenient record log - The default log directory and module configuration. - Specify the log directory and get the current configuration - Analysis of early warning framework preliminary - Buffer debug efficient log buffer, convenient - With PSR-3 Logger interface - Error and exception automatic logging - Support appender with File,TCP,UDP - Send to Rsyslog(TCP/UDP) with RFC5424 - Support RequestId differentiated requests - Support for log template customizations
r.n: - Fixed analyzerDetail bug, use grep -ai key_words. - Fixed issue #152. Segfault in cli.
